Ext.slider.Tip Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.1.0
  • Ext.slider.Tip
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.slider.Tip Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.slider.Single', {
        width: 214,
        minValue: 0,
        maxValue: 100,
        useTips: true,
        tipText: function(thumb) {
            return Ext.String.format('**{0}% complete**', thumb.value);
        },
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
